# NavigationWindow

- **ControlName**: NavigationWindow
- **CodeFile**: System/Windows/Navigation/NavigationWindow.cs
- **BaseClass**: Window
- **ControlType**: Control
- **ContentProperty**: Content

## Template parts

| Part Name | Part Type | Description |
|-----------|-----------|-------------|
| PART_NavWinCP | ContentPresenter | The content presenter that displays the navigated content. |

## Visual states

This control doesn't define any visual states.
